definition: in a difficult situation/to cut a sorry figure/scoundrel! (derog.)
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
villains collude together (idiom); to work hand in glove with sb (to nefarious ends)

sentences.english: They run rampant with spyware and viruses.

sentences.english: Why did he always think of HIM when he was in discomfiture?

sentences.english: This is my"legal"mentality intheface of society discomposure start.

sentences.english: He made an embarrassing gaffe at the convention last weekend.

sentences.english: Bob was in a pickle when his car broke down in a pouring rainstorm.
sentences.chinese: 鮑勃的汽車在傾盆大雨中熄火，使他狼狽不堪。

definition: at a loss to know what to do (idiom); bewildered
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
lit. badly burned about the head (from trying to put out a fire) (idiom)/fig. hard-pressed/under pressure (from a heavy workload, creditors etc)
